forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High near 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.
